meanings.definition: Having a darker shade of ink.
meanings.sent1: The inkier pen created a bold line on the paper.
meanings.sent2: Her drawing looked better with the inkier shading.
meanings.sent3: The inkier ink made the document look like a mysterious treasure map.
meanings.sent4: The inkier sky at night seemed to hold countless secrets.
meanings.sent5: The inkier color of the tattoo made it stand out beautifully on her skin.

meanings.sent1: The night grew inkier as the sun set below the horizon.
meanings.sent2: The inkier fabric absorbed more light than the lighter one.
meanings.sent3: His inkier hair made him look like a character from a fairy tale.
meanings.sent4: The inkier shadows in the room seemed to dance in the dim light.
meanings.sent5: The inkier paint on the canvas gave the artwork a sense of depth and richness.
